mapper.select: select c.name categoryName, s.name stuffName, u.username ownerName, s.deposit, s.rental, s.status, i.create_time createTime, i.rent_day rentDay from stuff s left join category c on s.category_id = c.id and c.mark = 1 left join user u on s.user_id = u.id and u.mark = 1 left join item i on s.id = i.stuff_id and i.mark = 1 where s.mark = 1 and s.status != 3;

select c.name categoryName, s.name stuffName, u.username renterName, s.deposit, s.rental, s.status, i.create_time createTime, i.rent_day rentDay from stuff s left join category c on s.category_id = c.id and c.mark = 1 left join item i on s.id = i.stuff_id and i.mark = 1 left join user u on i.user_id = u.id and u.mark = 1 where s.mark = 1 and s.user_id = #{userId}
